biography_text: HILL, Katie, a Representative from California; born on August 25, 1987; graduated from Saugus High School, Santa Clarita, Calif.; attended College of the Canyons, Santa Clarita, Calif.; B.A., California State University, Northridge, Calif., 2011; M.P.A., California State University, Northridge, Calif., 2014; non-profit executive; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
